title: Nutty pea salad
ingredients: ['500g frozen peas', '4 sticks celery, chopped', '145g salted roasted peanuts, crushed', '130g macadamia nuts, toasted, crushed', '1 (227g) tin sliced water chestnuts, drained', 'For the Dressing', '200ml creme fraiche', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 teaspoons sesame oil or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon honey or to taste', '1 teaspoon lime juice or to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped parsley']
